short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the live USD floor price of Optichads NFT project

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Optichads NFT Price Ticker Extension is a unique and innovative extension that allows users to stay up-to-date on the latest prices for Optichads NFTs - the number one project on Optimism that 50% of the royalties earned from Optichads NFT sales will be donated to Public Goods Funding.

This extension includes an alert feature, that allows users to set an alert for their desired price, in comparison with the current price. So users can easily track the value of their Optichads NFTs and stay informed about the latest developments in the NFT market.
